ingredients.title: Vex Milk
ingredients.description: collected from Vex, most commonly found on Nessus, and the Tangled Shore (Warden strike) (Best farm is the Nessus Artifact's Edge lost sector)

ingredients.title: Ether Cane
ingredients.description: collected from Fallen, most commonly found in the EDZ, the Moon, on Nessus, and the Tangled Shore

ingredients.title: Cabal Oil
ingredients.description: collected from Cabal, most commonly found in the EDZ, and the Tangled Shore

ingredients.title: Chitin Powder
ingredients.description: collected from Hive, most commonly found on the Tangled Shore, the Moon, and the Dreaming City

ingredients.title: Taken Butter
ingredients.description: collected from Taken, most commonly found in the EDZ, and the Dreaming City (Shuro Chi checkpoint/Chamber of Starlight in Dreaming City are the best to farm this.)

ingredients.title: Dark Ether Cane
ingredients.description: collected from Scorn, most commonly found on the Tangled Shore and Dreaming City (Tangled shore Lost Sector Kingship Dock is the best to farm this)

ingredients.title: Delicious Explosions
ingredients.description: explosive kills of any kind (grenade, rocket launcher, grenade launcher)

ingredients.title: Sharp Flavor
ingredients.description: sword kills on any enemy type

ingredients.title: Impossible Heat
ingredients.description: solar kills with either class abilities or weapon element

ingredients.title: Electric Flavor
ingredients.description: Arc kills with either class abilities or weapon element

ingredients.title: Null Taste
ingredients.description: Void kills with either class abilities or weapon element

ingredients.title: Flash of Inspiration
ingredients.description: (RARE) GENERATE Orbs of Light with Masterwork weapons or supers

ingredients.title: Personal Touch
ingredients.description: melee kills on any enemy type

ingredients.title: Perfect Taste
ingredients.description: precision kills on any enemy type

ingredients.title: Bullet Spray
ingredients.description: kills with automatic weapons (heavy machine gun, auto rifle, submachine gun)

ingredients.title: Finishing Touch
ingredients.description: finisher kills

ingredients.title: Balanced Flavors
ingredients.description: Scout Rifles, Pulse rifles, Sniper Rifles or Bows kills

ingredients.title: Pinch of Light
ingredients.description: picking up orbs of light

ingredients.title: Multifaceted Flavour
ingredients.description: multi kills (with weapons?)

ingredients.title: Superb Texture
ingredients.description: super kills
